casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE. No. 606A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2005. C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of October 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time for Court Reporter to Deliver Transcripts:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 7th day of February 2006 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in *296conference this the 1st day of November 2005."
